body.section: The IHTSDO Workbench IDE contains a high performance classifier (the IHTSDO Classifier ) for validating the inferred relationships inherent in the terminology, according to the Description Logics upon which SNOMED CT concepts are inter-related. . The IHTSDO Classifier is a highly optimised module for performing complete or incremental classification of SNOMED CT and which can be configured through business process plugins in a number of ways. The IHTSDO Classifier is based on the SnoRocket classifier developed by the Australian E-Health Research Centre. from The Australian E-Health Research Centre. ( http://e-hrc.net .) Additional information on configuration and performance characteristics for developers can be found in Integrating the IHTSDO Classifier .

In most releases, the Workbench IDE is bundled with a Classifier plugin, accessible via the Tasks section of the Editor's main menu. The following sections illustrate its use, including a simple example.
